alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 12:25PM EDT until March 28 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .The combination of rain that already fell overnight and expected additional rainfall into tonight will result in rises on the Green River. The river is forecast to crest at Paradise around a foot and a half above flood stage. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to Tuesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 365.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 381.6 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. &&
